item.title: Female TikTok Creators/UGC - Old (45+), Sister Duos, Public Creators - Upwork
item.description:
Description: We are looking for female UGC creators for our oral care brand

About the Opportunity:
Are you a female short form video creator interested in working with a top oral care brand (with an established social following)? We are looking for multiple creators to create content that drives sales!

What You'll Do:
Work with our internal team of marketers and other creators to create content that resonates with our ideal customer.

Bonus Points if You Are:
-Above 45 years old
-A sister due
-Couple team
-Bilingual

Scripts, hooks, video inspiration to be provided but we welcome all creators to be creative and work on their own ideas.

Send your portfolio and rates in the DMs.
Looking for 10-15 videos per month.
Hourly Rate: Will discuss


Posted On: June 25, 2024 20:53 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:UGC, Video Production, Video Editing, Content Writing, Social Media Marketing
Skills: UGC, Video Production, Video Editing, Content Writing, Social Media Marketing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: UGC Video showcasing our brand Men's T-shirt - Upwork
item.description:
We have started a clothing brand on Amazon and are interested in creating a brief video featuring a model showcasing our Men's t-shirts

If interested, we can share our amazon listing and you can order 2 of our t-shirts and we can refund the cost.
You can then shoot a short video and send it to us.
If the video works out well, we can collaborate for future t-shirt designs that we add as well


Budget: $100
Posted On: June 25, 2024 20:29 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:UGC, Video Production, Fashion Modeling, Video Commercial, Photography, Video Editing, Video Ad, Male
Skills: UGC, Video Production, Fashion Modeling, Video Commercial, Photography, Video Editing, Video Ad, Male
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
